1.content: Design comprehensive test plan for all website areas
1.details: Create detailed testing framework covering: Homepage, Directory, Profiles, Authentication, Admin, Static Pages, Forms, Payment, Mobile, Performance, Security, Accessibility, SEO

2.details: Test homepage functionality, navigation, featured consultants section, service categories, mobile responsiveness, visual elements, and user interface consistency

3.details: Comprehensive testing of Find Consultants page: search functionality, all filter combinations, sorting options, pagination, result display, performance under various conditions

4.details: Test individual consultant profiles, contact forms, quote request system, profile information display, contact methods, and user interaction flows

5.details: Test sign up, sign in, password reset, user sessions, security features, form validation, error handling, and user flow edge cases

6.details: Test admin authentication, consultant management, user management, analytics, approval workflows, and administrative functions

7.content: Execute Static Content & Information Pages Testing
7.details: Test About, How it Works, Pricing, Privacy Policy, Terms, Contact, Brexit Guide, and all informational pages for content accuracy and functionality

8.details: Test page load speeds, security headers, XSS protection, accessibility compliance (WCAG), SEO elements, meta tags, structured data

9.details: Test website functionality across different browsers, devices, screen sizes, and ensure responsive design works properly

10.content: Compile comprehensive test results and recommendations
10.details: Analyze all test results, identify issues, provide recommendations, and create final comprehensive testing report with all findings
